instructions.step1: Replace 'TUODOMINIO.com' with your actual WordPress domain
instructions.step2: Replace 'LA_TUA_API_KEY_WORDPRESS' with your actual API key from WordPress plugin
instructions.step3: Save the node and test the workflow

how_to_get_values.api_key: WordPress Admin → WhatsApp SaaS → Settings → Copy API Key

troubleshooting.401_error: Invalid API Key - Check and copy correct key from WordPress
troubleshooting.404_error: URL wrong or plugin not active - Verify WordPress plugin activation
troubleshooting.500_error: WordPress server error - Check WordPress error logs
troubleshooting.timeout: Server too slow - Increase timeout or check hosting performance
